description: The cheers had barely died down after Rijeka's opening ceremony when the pandemic struck.
title: Coronavirus: Croatia's culture capital Rijeka tries to salvage year
title_page: Coronavirus: Croatia's culture capital Rijeka tries to salvage year - BBC News
maintext: He has seen his city struggle through tough times, as traditional industries such as shipbuilding have gone into decline. Rijeka 2020 should have been a relaunch - putting the city on the international map and changing its image within Croatia. But Mr Obersnel remains optimistic that it will still achieve those goals.
